content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully established on the map. Although there were multiple attempts to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) and to craft one for research purposes, none were placed. The operations involving furnaces (at positions (5.0, 5.0) and (–27.0, –60.0)) were used for processing resources rather than for constructing a dedicated production structure.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Consistency:
  – When using get_entities, match the function’s signature exactly. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as 'radius') or an incorrect number of positional arguments.
  
• Lab Placement and Inventory Verification:
  – Always verify that the Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map. A missing Lab in inventory leads to placement failures.

• Lab Crafting Resource Management:
  – Ensure all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are available in the needed quantities before initiating Lab crafting. Shortages in any one component will cause the crafting process to fail.
  
• Handling Entity Retrieval:
  – When filtering or iterating over retrieved entities, confirm that the function returns a valid list (or an empty list) rather than None. This avoids errors such as trying to iterate over a NoneType object.
